TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {543327=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 169572=Tidewater Community College is located in the heart of downtown with a variety of options for food. The Students Center just opened in the summer of 2011 and is a wonderful option for students who dont want to walk too far from campus to grab a bite to eat., 202317=Currently unavailable, but will be availalbe by March 2014., 127255=The Norfolk Campus Tidewater community college was the first campus to have a student center it open on May 23,2011 that is a place were students can hang out in between classes it has five floors . The first floor is open to the public which has two cafes on that floor . The other floors can only be access if you are a tcc student with an tcc id card which is provide by the school once you are enrolled into classess., 401654=TCC doesn't have a dorm because it is a community college. TCC offers day-care starting in the beginning of January or February. Also they offer employment for students that want to work part-time while they are in school., 130464=Hello prospective students i use to be open of you but then I was at the beach and I was thinking i do not just want a high school diploma because that will not get me very far in life. textAfterTable: Carly from Virginia Beach, VA 03/06/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 137 Categories Comments Great for these types of students TCC is great for students that like a laid back college environment. The Virginia Beach campus is close to the beach and to the mall, so there are plenty of places to spend time between classes. Tips for prospective students Sign up for your classes as quickly as possible, especially chemistry classes because they fill up fast. After you sign up for your classes go straight to financial aid and make sure your classes are covered because this school doesn't play around or go out of their way to help you out unless you ask for it. Bang for the buck The prices for this school are decent and I love the way financial aid works. Before you go to the bookstore you get a little slip of paper saying how much you have in your financial aid account & what all
